pages.text: This system supports transferring items above stack limit, by extracting from modded storages such as Drawer.$(br2)Item nodes can also interact with composters.$(br2)You can add $(l:concepts/a2_upgrades)drop upgrade$(/l) to allow dropping item on ground or $(l:concepts/a2_upgrades)place upgrade$(/l) to allow placing block items on ground.

Item nodes support $(l:concepts/a1_filter)filter$(/l) through right click, fine tune amount through configuration wand, or open complex filter UI for full control.$(br2)In filter UI, right click filter slot with item, or drag item from JEI into filter slot to set filter.$(br2)You can specify if you want to care about item NBT or not.
